title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Fall in North Georgia
content:
Photo submitted by Patrick Chamberlain, “Changing leaves on a gravel road.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Fall in North Georgia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
